ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Includes Resourcecode hindcast database (see <https://resourcecode.ifremer.fr>) configuration data: nodes locations for both the sea-state parameters and the spectra data; examples of time series of 1D and 2D surface elevation variance spectral density.

Includes Resourcecode hindcast database (see <https://resourcecode.ifremer.fr>) configuration data: nodes locations for both the sea-state parameters and the spectra data; examples of time series of 1D and 2D surface elevation variance spectral density.

name: r-resourcecodedata
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-resourcecodedata
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/resourcecodedata_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/resourcecodedata/resourcecodedata_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 260d0e2cf0ccfe3bff39fd3bcf7c7087c744103e68c2892da5103e49c8ab60b8

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('resourcecodedata')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('resourcecodedata')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/Resourcecode-project/r-resourcecodedata/, https://resourcecode-project.r-universe.dev/resourcecodedata/,
    https://resourcecode-project.github.io/r-resourcecodedata/
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: 'Includes Resourcecode hindcast database (see <https://resourcecode.ifremer.fr>) configuration
    data: nodes locations for both the sea-state parameters and the spectra data; examples
    of time series of 1D and 2D surface elevation variance spectral density.'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - NRaillard

# Package: resourcecodedata
# Title: Resourcecode Database Configuration Data
# Version: 1.0.0
# Authors@R: person("Nicolas", "Raillard", , "nicolas.raillard@ifremer.fr", role = c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0003-3385-5104"))
# Description: Includes Resourcecode hindcast database (see <https://resourcecode.ifremer.fr>) configuration data: nodes locations for both the sea-state parameters and the spectra data; examples of time series of 1D and 2D surface elevation variance spectral density.
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# URL: https://github.com/Resourcecode-project/r-resourcecodedata/, https://resourcecode-project.r-universe.dev/resourcecodedata/, https://resourcecode-project.github.io/r-resourcecodedata/
# BugReports: https://github.com/Resourcecode-project/r-resourcecodedata/issues
# Depends: R (>= 3.5)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Language: en-GB
